Articles.Content: This isn't really KSP but it is really cool and COULD be linked to KSP. This Dad built a mission control desk for his kid... and it is just SCREAMING for a link to KSP.
Beautiful But...how many of us have necessary amount of free space to set this thing up? I certainly do not

Now what this control console really need is to change the map to LCD panel, one or two joysticks with pedals for rudder control, throttle stick and KSP integration though kRPC

Add TAC life support with full blown Realism Overhaul and we have near-real life spaceflight simulator

If only it was so.

Honestly one of my first thoughts after i saw the kRPC release. Would love to see some data displays/physical button panels.
